title: Hard knocks
creator_credit: Andromeda Productions, Hilton Bonner and Don McLennan
brief_description: A young girl, with a background of urban poverty and juvenile crime, attempts to become a fashion model. The hypocrisy and double standards of society are juxtaposed against the confusion and frustration she feels as she struggles to become part of a community that has no place for her.
